page.title: 20COATES COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
The staff and pupils of {Coates County Primary School} are responsible for the collection of data for this grid area, and the presentation of the data. The school is situated in the village of Coates and draws its pupils from the village, the neighbouring hamlet of Eastrea, and the surrounding farmland. The school houses a pre-school playgroup for children aged 3 or over. In the school itself, there are 134 pupils aged from 4+ to 11+ arranged in 3 classes.The school opened on 1877 with only 3 pupils!
July,1985 Edward John Atkinson (Headteacher)
